changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `waiver_type`( `waiver_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `role` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `retired` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL, `retired_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`waiver_id`), CONSTRAINT `waiver_type_user_role_definition` FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `role` (`role`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
